review: Amazing experience! The beaches were pristine and the local culture was fascinating.
Breathtaking views and excellent service. Would definitely recommend!
Good trip overall, but the weather wasn't ideal during our stay.
The cultural experience was incredible. Loved every moment of it!
The mountain views were spectacular. Hiking trails were well-maintained.
The city was vibrant and full of history. Great food too!
Historical sites were amazing, but it was very crowded.
